file.title: Text

p.text: A text specified in this property is displayed on the object.

p.textAll: For example, the text of the object Window is its title and the text of the object Text box is a text which is input in it.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how main window text can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Window1.Text = "New text of window title" Window1.Window1.Text = "New" & "text of window title" Window1.Window1.Text = Window1.Window1.Text & "<- window text" Window1.Window1.Text = "Window width: """ & Window1.Window1.Width & """"

remarks.text: If it is necessary to input quotes into text then you should double them inside of the text:
remarks.codesnip: "There a text is without quotes and ""there is in quotes""."

p.text: To insert Newline (equal to pressing of Enter key) use Quick fill words -> Others or input a symbol "¶"
